Class Threshold

Building threshold for Example of usage:

const threshold: Threshold = new Threshold(); threshold.create('45df68ab75bb7ed1063b7615298e81c1ca1b0c362ef2e93937b7bba9d7c43a94').then((s) => { console.log(s); });
